name: Element Dance
description:
Element Dance About.

 A Game made by Red Scale Studio using Unity. 

The game is unfinished and still in development! 

Element Dance is a game focused on platform elements with a bit of spice of metroidvania. 

The game revolves around using elements and its unique weapons and combos. Element Dance takes place in Primastine, a magical place that uses its powers from elemental stones. 

Each stone can hold a huge power and is secured within three temples. You're Magi, an unique being with a journey to find your ancestor who gifted you with a magical talking staff. 

This version is a demo, full game coming soon... 

Made by Red Scale Studio, contact us.
